name: Text + graph(grouped bar)
description: Displays a grouped bar chart to compare multiple datasets side-by-side across several categories. This is ideal for breaking down a total and comparing its components over time or against other categories (e.g., comparing expense types month by month).
examples: Show my spending history for this month.
Show my step count for this week.
What are my app usage times?
Compare my workout hours by week for this month.

component_title.description: The title for the chart (e.g., 'Monthly Spending', 'Weekly Activity').

metric_text.description: A specific data point or summary metric to be displayed with the graph, including its value and unit (e.g., '5,400 steps', '3h 15m').
